statements: UPDATE AB_tests SET test_name = 'New Test Name' WHERE test_id = 1;
UPDATE AB_tests SET test_description = 'Updated test description', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE test_id = 2;
UPDATE AB_tests SET traffic_allocation = 0.5, test_description = 'Updated description' WHERE test_id = 1;
UPDATE AB_tests SET test_results = '{"variant_A": 100, "variant_B": 150}' WHERE test_name = 'Homepage_banner_test';
UPDATE ab_test_logs SET user_id = 101 WHERE test_id = 1;
UPDATE seo_metrics SET time_on_page = 60, organic_traffic = 500 WHERE metric_id = 3;
UPDATE ab_test_logs SET timestamp = NOW(), variation = 'B' WHERE test_id = 101;
UPDATE seo_metrics SET organic_traffic = 500, bounce_rate = 0.25, time_on_page = 45 WHERE metric_id = 201;
UPDATE A/B_Test_Results SET Test_Name = 'Homepage Test' WHERE Test_ID = 1;
UPDATE Website_Content SET Content_Text = 'Updated content text', Content_URL = 'https://www.example.com' WHERE Content_ID = 5;
UPDATE A/B_Test_Results SET Test_Name = 'Homepage Test', Test_Variant = 'Variant A' WHERE Test_ID = 1;
UPDATE Website_Content SET Content_Text = 'New content text', Content_URL = 'www.example.com/new' WHERE Content_ID = 5;
UPDATE ab_test_results SET test_variation = 'B' WHERE test_id = 1;
UPDATE website_content SET content_title = 'New Title', publish_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE content_id = 3;
UPDATE ab_test_results SET test_variation = 'variation_A' WHERE test_id = 1;
UPDATE website_content SET content_title = 'New Title', content_body = 'New Body' WHERE content_id = 5;
UPDATE ab_tests SET test_description = 'New Description' WHERE test_id = 1;
UPDATE test_variants SET variant_description = 'Updated Variant' WHERE variant_id = 2;
UPDATE ab_tests SET test_description = 'New description for Test A' WHERE test_id = 1;
UPDATE test_variants SET variant_description = 'Updated info for Variant B' WHERE variant_id = 2;
